cab.content: y Secret.JItllJ5 ^T^rrt Is the Property of *1071From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,4th September 1919.(Received 6th.)12025. 3rd September. Malleson wires he is in communication with some Austrians who are willing to come over if assured, of immediate repatriation. He suggests that one hundred be invited in first instalment. We have authorised him to give necessary assurance and are endeavouring to arrange shipping.
